topic.title: Full tor mode?
topic.body:
Hi!
I am running tor and ZN and on ZN's start page it says "Port: Closed" and "Tor: OK"
Does that now mean I can connect to normal peers AND onions or that I connect ONLY to .onions? 
In the stats sections it says I am connected to 4 peers.
What if I want ONLY onion??

1_17ApQKugX1XH727gpAeD3mrRLjLxASdakd.body:
> [gabriel](#comment_2_1LLCfj6q47nJ2aXEVFSmy9Nv4dkKKJyUBQ): To me, social networking and privacy-centric networks and darknets are mutually exclusive. What's the point of getting into zeronet if you're gonna do the same thing you can do on facebook?

Exactly for that.
I want to share my private ideas, events, photos, ... PRIVATELY with my friends. 
So of course, some privacy-enhanced fb-lik thingy run on ZN would be perfect.
privacy enhanced means: end to end encrypted, authenticated, severless, hiding meta data (to whom I am connected), etc.

> [ripper234](#comment_3_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL): http://www.synereo.com/ should integrate with it.

Is it open source??

2_1P8VJL2iKWfUB4hqQkrFdXCbC8RrimAZoZ.body:
lol. 
Or pay me only $100.
You don't even have to join any groups for that, just pay
